feed.title: Remember Websites? Man, I Remember Websites.

entry.title: A collection of the most useful tools, technologies, and websites I've seen
entry.summary: Publii - Open-Source CMS for Static Site Web Page Generation and what I am using to build this site (hosted thru Github Pages) Single Page static website with only css and html - Not what I'm using for this project, but I considered it Yunohost…
entry.content:
Publii - Open-Source CMS for Static Site Web Page Generation and what I am using to build this site (hosted thru Github Pages)

Single Page static website with only css and html - Not what I'm using for this project, but I considered it

Yunohost - The simplest way I've found to host your own cloud. 

Gather - Online meetings that look like a videogame

Opus databending drumkit

Hosting SQLite databases on Github Pages - (or any static file hoster) - phiresky's blog

The Algorithms - GitHub's largest open-source algorithm library

The Life You Can Save - Best Charities for Effective Giving

Every Noise at Once - Click on any genre to hear a song
